name: Custom WP Admin Login
author: Anshul Labs

sections.description:
Custom WP Admin Login is a simple way to change you WordPress admin login background. Custom WP Admin Login plugin give ability to customize your WordPress admin login page according to you. Plugin allows to change background color, background image, custom logo and logo title text.

The Custom WP Admin Login plugin supports the following features:

  • Add Custom Logo
  • Add Custom Logo Title Text
  • Choose Background Color
  • Add a Background Image
  • Backup Your Setting for Background Style

Donate Me

If you are having any kind of issue with configuring our plugin or you face any problem, Contact us on hello@anshullabs.xyz
sections.installation:
1. Upload the custom-wp-admin-login folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Custom WP Admin Login Option Page by admin menu.
  4. Configure the plugin setting as you want.
sections.faq:
1) How to Use ?

After Activate plugin goto “Custom WP Admin Login” menu to configure plugin setting.
